entry.data:
SHOWERS WITH A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS THIS EVENING, THEN SHOWERS LIKELY AFTER MIDNIGHT
LOWS IN THE LOWER 50S
SOUTHWEST WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH, BECOMING WEST 15 TO 20 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 30 MPH AFTER MIDNIGHT
CHANCE OF RAIN NEAR 100 PERCENT

PARTLY SUNNY WITH A CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE MORNING, THEN SUNNY IN THE AFTERNOON
COOLER
LESS HUMID WITH HIGHS IN THE MID 60S
NORTHWEST WINDS 15 TO 20 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 30 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 50 PERCENT

CLEAR
LOWS IN THE LOWER 40S
WEST WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH, BECOMING SOUTHWEST AROUND 5 MPH AFTER MIDNIGHT

SUNNY
HIGHS AROUND 70
SOUTH WINDS 15 TO 20 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS AROUND 50
SOUTH WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 25 MPH, BECOMING SOUTHWEST AFTER MIDNIGHT

CLEAR

LOWS IN THE LOWER 40S

MOSTLY CLEAR
